jobDescription: The Data Scientist role is responsible for modeling complex problems, discovering insights and identifying opportunities through the use of statistical, algorithmic, mining and visualization techniques. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialized database and computing environments, and communicating results.  The primary role of a Data Scientist in the Audit organization is to support audits through implementation of the above techniques. Ideal candidates would have a strong mathematical and statistical background with an understanding of Computer Science and associated technologies. Domain Expertise in any part of the business is a plus. Prior experience in Python, R, SQL, MS BI, Java, and/or Visual Studio (C++, C#, F#, etc.) is required.
